nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two unsigned integers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two unsigned integers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

@dev Event to log the creation of an escrow
Logs the unique ID that is used to identify an escrow. Can be queried to obtain additional escrow details.

params._id: Transfers funds to the receiver in the escrow, transfers the fee to the resolver and changes the state of the escrow.
Transfers funds to the depositer in the escrow, transfers the fee to the resolver and changes the state of the escrow.

params._tokenAddress: Sets up the owner, creation time and token address of the ERC-20 token.

params._id: @param _funds @param _receiver @param _resolver @param _fee  Creates an escrow using the unique ID. Sets the funds, receiver, resolver and a fee in percentage. Sets the state of the escrow. It transfers the funds, creates an escrow and emits an event.

raiseDispute(bytes32).details: Depositer or receiver raises a dispute.

params._id: Transfers funds to the receiver in the escrow, transfers the fee to the resolver and changes the state of the escrow.
@param _decision Resolver resolves a disputed contract in either direction. Funds and fees are transferred.
